pr_title: [RW-5820][risk=no] Add Survey Explorer link to Surveys criteria search

timeline.message: RW-5820 add Survey Explorer link to survey tree
RW-5820 move links to criteria search component
RW-5820 remove growl references from cohort search
RW-5820 add back arrow for demographics
RW-5820 use survey names for title in concept search
RW-5820 fix cope survey title for smaller screens

timeline.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: So if I use the destructuring syntax (cohortContext: {domain, type}), I can't use the cohortContext part of that, so I have to declare it once to get the full object and once to get the child properties.
replies.author: dolbeew

replies.bodyText: i see the cohortContext now thanks
replies.author: NehaBroad
